name: APPLE-TUBE (BIG 2020 UPDATE)
description: If you're an Apple fanboy you'll definitely like this style, because it gives YouTube a more refined touch. This theme adds rounded corners, a better darkmode, blurry backgrounds, shadows and overall a just better looking UI. !!!ONLY USE WITH YOUTUBE DARKMODE ACTIVATED!!! WORKS BETTER WITH CHROME OR OPERA SINCE THERE IS NO OFFICIAL SUPPORT FOR BACKDROP FILTERS IN MOZILLA FIREFOX (Otherwise you won’t have blurry backgrounds, but transparent backgrounds. This doesn’t look very well) IF YOU USE CHROME PLEASE ENABLE THIS FLAG: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features IF YOU USE OPERA PLEASE ENABLE THIS FLAG: opera://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features Known Issues: - Rainbow Theme: Rainbow Elements are not synchronised
additional_info: This theme keeps getting updates and fixes, so therefore please check for updates from time to time. Also feel free to DM me if you encounter a bug or have a suggestion for a design improvement. If you like this theme please leave some positive feedback. This motivates me too work even more on this theme. [ 17/07/2020 ] - Feed filter design update [ 10/06/2020 ] - Fixed volume- / progress bar issue [ 21/05/2020 ] - Added support for feed filter [ 17/02/2020 ] - Added support for YouTube ads [ 02/02/2020 ] - Added option to change color theme [ 04/01/2020 ] - Added support for YouTube surveys [ 29/12/2019 ] - Added channel-header and -tabs blur filter - Added option to change progress bar / volume slider theme
